interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Ivnil hair removal spray pack of 2 Review Date: 2021/08/22 Store: Ivnil Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Anti-aging', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Ivnil', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '2.76 x 2.32 x 2.28 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '752771042412'} Review Text: This product makes my under eyes feel great. While I’m not noticing any less of the darkness under my eyes I do notice they don’t seem as dry.
It’s easy to use and does not have a scent that I can detect. It only takes a small amount under each eye. Blot it in and follow with an overall face moisturizer and your ready to go.
I like this product. Review Title: Like this Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Purple Shampoo and Conditioner Set - No, Orange, Yellow or Brassy Tones - Best Toner Treatment for Brassiness - Blonde, Grey, Bleached or Silver Hair - Sulfate Free PURE NATURE LUX SPA {'Product Benefits': 'Nourishing,Clean,Gentle', 'Material Type Free': 'Sulfate Free', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'PURE NATURE LUX SPA', 'Hair Type': 'Color', 'Package Dimensions': '7.68 x 6.06 x 3.19 inches; 2.68 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'PURE NATURE LUX SPA', 'UPC': '765066671143'} If I could I would give this minus stars. It's horrible. The shampoo does not lather and the conditioner does not condition. It does not smell good and it left my hair feeling like straw. Very dry straw. I do not recommend this. You will be sorry.
To be fair though this does cut down on that brassy or yellowish look.
I hate giving bad reviews but this product is no good. Horrid Hair Curlers Spiral Curls Large Hair Rollers Wavy Hair Curler - Self Grip and No Heat Hair Styling Kit for Most Kinds Of Hairstyles With 2 Magic Wands (28 Pcs, 30cm) RIPPLE {'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Size': '28 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Brand': 'RIPPLE', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9.09 x 6.93 x 3.31 inches; 7.37 Ounces'} These were easy to use after watching a YouTube video explaining how to use them. I had no idea until I watched that. They were so easy though. I washed my hair and let it get almost dry then used these. I have long hair and was afraid doing the end parts would leave the upper part of my hair frizzy but it didn't. They worked great. Next time I will leave them on overnight too. I have soft and bouncy hair and these made my very curly underneath part lay much better. No more. using heat on my hair.
It would have got 5 stars had it come with just a picture showing how to use these. Also I am wondering how to get the wand back apart to store it.
I very highly recommend this product. So neat ikoo Deep Caring Hair Mask, Hydrate & Shine, Great for Normal, Dry or Lackluster Hair, All Natural Ingredients, Effectively Hydrates, Moisturizes & Adds Shine - 6.8 Fl Oz ikoo {'Brand': 'Ikoo', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Natural, Cruelty Free, Vegan', 'Hair Type': 'Dry,Normal', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.74 x 3.74 x 3.15 inches; 11.68 Ounces'} Not only is this product worthless, it stinks. I hated the smell. I can't tell if it is onion or garlic or a combo of the two. It didn't work out my tangles at all and I left it on a bit more than ten minutes.
I do not recommend this product. Save your money.
I received this as a Vine Reviewer and this is my honest opinion. Smells nice Veencys - Hair Straightening Treatment - Brazilian Keratin - Chocolate Treatment -Maximum Strength-Ideal for Moisturizing Eliminates Frizzy Hairs Smooth Hair 32oz (946 ml) Veencys {'Package Dimensions': '9.84 x 3.15 x 3.11 inches; 2.34 Pounds'} First listed ingredient is aqua formaldehyde. What’s up with that. I will not use this until it’s explained to me. That is a bit scary.
Don’t buy this product until that is rectified. It’s dangerous. You can google the effects of the formaldehyde and see for yourself.
In the picture, above the green line are the ingredients. The first one is formaldehyde. Scary Blackhead Remover Pore Vacuum- Inface Blackhead Remover Suctioner, USB Electric Acne Comedone Whitehead Extractor Tool with 4 Different Type Replaceable Probes INFACE {'Brand': 'INFACE', 'Item Form': 'Pen', 'Material': 'Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene', 'Color': 'Pearl White', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Package Dimensions': '8.1 x 4 x 2 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'Item model number': '01', 'UPC': '767136985860', 'Manufacturer': 'inFace', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} I have some blackheads on my nose and whiteheads on my chin and this helps get them out. I think with continued use it will keep them under control. I do recommend you using it. Be sure and read the instructions first though. I like this Ivnil hair removal spray pack of 2 Ivnil {'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Anti-aging', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Ivnil', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '2.76 x 2.32 x 2.28 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '752771042412'} This product makes my under eyes feel great. While I’m not noticing any less of the darkness under my eyes I do notice they don’t seem as dry.
It’s easy to use and does not have a scent that I can detect. It only takes a small amount under each eye. Blot it in and follow with an overall face moisturizer and your ready to go.
I like this product. Like this
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference:** The user continues to prioritize hair care solutions targeting brassiness in color-treated blonde, grey, or silver hair while expanding their interest to include effective beauty tools and treatments, as evidenced by their recent purchase of a hair removal product.

- **Quality Expectations:** Their high standards for product performance emphasize effectiveness and user experience. Recent evaluations reflect a critical approach toward products, ensuring they align with their robust expectations for quality and outcomes.

- **Ingredient Sensitivity:** The user maintains a strong preference for sulfate-free and natural formulations and remains vigilant regarding potentially harmful ingredients. Their careful scrutiny regarding product safety highlights their commitment to safer options for both hair and skin care.

- **Review Behavior:** Known for providing detailed and honest feedback, the user evaluates products based on performance, safety, and ease of use. Their recent review of a beauty treatment reflects positive sentiments, noting its efficacy in enhancing user experience while managing expectations about results.

- **Overall Disposition:** The user expresses disappointment when products do not meet their expectations but appreciates those that deliver satisfactory outcomes. Their thorough evaluation of hair care and beauty products underscores a commitment to effectiveness, safety, and informed decision-making in their selections.
